Al-Shamal Stadium (Arabic) bụ ámá egwuregwu bọọlụ a tụrụ aro ya na Ash-Shamel, Qatar

A tụụrụ ya aro dị ka akụkụ nke Qatar 2022 FIFA World Cup bid, ọ gaara enwe ikike nke 45,120. Mgbe asọmpi iko mba ụwa gasịrị, a ga-ebelata ámá egwuregwu ahụ ruo 25,000. E wurughị ámá egwuregwu ahụ, ebe ndị ọzọ ga-enwekwa egwuregwu na Qatar 2022.
Ọ bụ Albert Speer & Partners mere atụmatụ ahụ, ma sitere na dhow ọdịnala, ụgbọ mmiri ịkụ azụ nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe na Arab States nke Persian Gulf
